name: Crystal Spires
description:
This is a hard core shooting survival game; in the game, there is only one rule: no matter what, do everything possible to survive. However, in the face of multiple threats, it is not easy to survive.
Main features:

Can checkpoint or archive, if you die, will not lose everything, do not have to start from scratch.

Complex and realistic survival mechanism, including design, tree and resource management.

The interaction with other enemies is usually unpredictable, and there are often a large number of insidious and cunning enemies, which bring unlimited play to the game.

A vast map; with all kinds of beauty and dense jungle.

You have to do everything necessary to survive.

All kinds of situations will threaten and test your ability. Dense jungle, invisible enemy.

Pick up your weapons and kill the enemy!
